name: In Between (itch) (circlejourney)
description:
You're a reaper searching for a queen who is overdue for death. Solve puzzles, beat monsters, solve more puzzles, and .

Created for PengJam 2021. All assets were made by me except the character portraits, which were a commission from misnina (https://toyhou.se/misnina). Currently, it is still pending tests and feedback, but the core game is done.
